content: this pattern shows you how to take quilt patterns and turn them into crocheted quilts it is not a completed afghan pattern rather how to do the technique be warned because of the numerous ends think 6 per square in the multi-coloured squares these projects can become tedious at best i highly recommend weaving ends in as you make each square much less mind-numbing they also take much more yardage than a normal square plan for that in your design you can use any weight in your design - sport for baby ghans and worsted for adult just make sure you really weave in your ends well or the ghan will fall apart voice of experience
